About Me

I am a 2nd Lieutenant in the United States Air Force. Currently attending the Air Force Institute of Tech (AFIT) Civlian Instiution Program for a Masters student in Cyber Security. I have a passion for web development, cyber security, and all things tech!

My technical background begins at the University of California Davis where I graduated with a degree in Mechanical Engineering. Directly following graduation, I completed Coding Dojoâ€™s onsite Berkeley bootcamp where I learned Full Stack Web Development in Python, Java, and JavaScript.

Projects

Check it out on GitHub

Defense-SQL

A Web Crawler built to identify SQL Injection vunerabilities. Simply type in the desired URL and the scanner will search for user input forms. Once a form is found, the scanner will probe the POST route with common SQL injection queries. The HTTP response is analysed and the results are shown below the URL input.

Built With

JavaScript | Node.js & Express.js | Angular | Stripe API | Twillio API

Investor's Corner

An investing focused social networking application. Built to accompnay the Robinhood app, Investors corner combines investment APIs with a social media platform.

Built With

Python | Django | Twillio | Yahoo Finanace | Robinhood API
